title: S but no chest (4 available)
body:
have had a couple of S's since season reset but dont seem to be getting chests.

Anyone else having this issue?

replies.body:
Ok checklist time.

You own the champion you earned the S grade on?
You haven't received a chest on them yet this season?
You don't have locked honour/rewards?

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=Tn06MJ9z,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-11T09:53:52.426+0000)
>
> Ok checklist time.
> 
> You own the champion you earned the S grade on?
> You haven't received a chest on them yet this season?
> You don't have locked honour/rewards?

was locked honour apparently. I thought it would have reset at start of season (suspension was early october)
Only those level 3 or above had their honour reset. I'm sure you can get it back soon enough though :)

> [{quoted}](name=Anthony carmine,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=Tn06MJ9z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-10T13:11:39.200+0000)
>
> I've had this problem too

thanks for letting me know. I wonder if it is an oddity or a regular occurance.
